name: Single filer at low income
description: Standard case for single person earning €25,000 in the Netherlands

sources.description: Calculated using official 2025 Dutch tax rates and credits from Belastingdienst
sources.notes: Income tax rate: 35.82% on first €38,441. General credit: €3,068 (full). Labour credit: €980 + 30.030% of (income - €12,169)
